alert.note: Alert for Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 30 at 9:53AM CDT until March 30 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Harris County in southeastern Texas... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 952 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hidden Valley, or over Greater Greenspoint, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Galena Park, Jacinto City, Midtown Houston, Cloverleaf, Downtown Houston, Northside / Northline, Second Ward, Greater Greenspoint, Greater Heights, Greater Eastwood, Near Northside Houston, Greater Fifth Ward, Aldine, Greater Third Ward, Fourth Ward, Channelview, Macgregor, Neartown / Montrose, eastern Memorial Park and Golfcrest / Bellfort / Reveille. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
